name: White Ops 2
description:
Welcome to Phone of Duty: White Ops 2 released with nothing else than 1 map and 1 weapon (AK47) and nothing else.

Always wanted a better version of Black Ops 2?

You are at the wrong place !

Always wanted to see what does Black Ops 2 look with RTX ?

You are at the right place ! I hope you have a great computer since they're is no optimizations LOL

Always wanted a girlfriend?

With this game, it's will not help you
